content:
Could anyone take a look at https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-libc/pull/518? I'm not the author, but would like to see it land. My understanding is that it is blocking LLVM merging a PR to support compiling LLVM for WASI.

Implement a stub pthreads library for `THREAD_MODEL=single` by ArcaneNibble 路 Pull Request #518 路 WebAssembly/wasi-libc
This patch series first starts with a number of commits stubbing out functions in the existing THREAD_model=posix code. According to "The Open Group Base Specifications Issue 7, 2018 edition&q...
I can look at it on Monday again
I reviewed this but had one main concern. Is there anyone who knows ArcaneNibble and can ask him to come chat here?
